titleStmt.title: The Christian combate, or, A treatise of afflictions, with a prayer and meditation of the faithfull soule, and a sermon vpon the 50. Psal. vers. 15. / By Master Peter Du Moulin, minister of the word of God, and professor of divinity, in the Vniuersity of Sedan. ; faithfully translated into English by Iohn Bulteel, minister of the word of God, in the French church of Canterbury..
Du combat chrestien. English
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
J. B. (John Bulteel), d. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.K. for I. Budge and N. Newbery, and are to be sold at the Greene Dragon in Pauls Churchyard.,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A-P¹² Q⁸ (A₁ and final leaf blank?).
